New Revit Applications

What kind of applications can you create today with the Revit API?

A lot of exciting new products were displayed at Autodesk University. Lachmi Khemlani, the editor of AECbytes, provides an interesting overview of these in her article on the AEC exhibitor highlights at Autodesk University 2008.
